title: Drawing, Page of a sketchbook; Elevation of wall and Judith, ca. 1590
title_raw: Page of a sketchbook; Elevation of wall and Judith
medium: Pen and brown ink, brown wash (verso) on paper
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Vertical rectangle. Verso: Elevation of wall or gateway, shown in two bays. Arched openings on lower story, with a broad frieze above surmounted, center, by a balcony or musicians gallery. Recto: Eleven lines of handwriting, and Judith with head of Holfernes.

participants.person_name: Jan van der Straet, called Stradanus

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Page of a sketchbook; Elevation of wall and Judith, ca. 1590. Pen and brown ink, brown wash (verso) on paper. 
Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-2835
